name: X-Cell 1999
description:
USB Controller Supported!

Controls:

WASD to move
LSHIFT to break
ESC to pause.

X-Cell 99 is a humble attempt to pay homage to classic racing games like F-Zero and Wipeout. 

Models made with Blender using Sprytile
Music made with PSX Generator 2000
Made in Unity using PSX-RetroShader
